name: BreakFree on Cashel
description:
Breakfree on Cashel has a unique urban feel, modern design and a high level of integrated technology. The fun and funky rooms come in an array of formations, and include unparalleled technology extras. It's all about location at BreakFree on Cashel. This modern Christchurch hotel has cutting edge facilities with an ultramodern twist and is located in the heart of the CBD. It is an easy walk to the City's landmarks such as Cathedral Square, Ballantynes department store and the Earthquake memorial.

It's all about location at BreakFree on Cashel. This modern Christchurch hotel has cutting edge facilities with an ultramodern twist and is located in New Zealand's South Island, so you can easily walk to the city's main landmarks. The sleek, stylish rooms for singles, couples or families include unparalleled technology extras BreakFree on Cashel makes it easy to stay connected with the outside world from the sublime comfort of your Sleepy Head bed.

Breakfree on Cashel hotel rooms are innovative, modern and stylish, with a unique urban feel throughout. A premier conference and leisure destination, BreakFree on Cashel's facilities feature many extras including free fibre optic WiFi.

For those wishing to explore this reimagined city, or those simply visiting on business, Breakfree on Cashel hotel offers great value, plenty of diversions and a superb central location.

James Cunningham, Hotel Management

Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.

houseRules.notes:
The guest can cancel free of charge until 3 day before arrival. 
The guest will be charged a prepayment of the total price of the reservation within 3 day before arrival.
Please note that there is a 2% charge when you pay with a credit card.

Guests under the age of 18 can only check in with a parent or official guardian. The legal guardian must provide a current photo ID or proof of guardianship if requested upon check-in.

Please note that 2GB of free WiFi is provided per stay for up to 4 devices. Additional data can be purchased for an extra charge of NZD 10.

Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.

A damage deposit of NZD 200 is required on arrival, if a valid credit card is not presented. This will be collected as a cash payment. You should be reimbursed on check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full in cash, subject to an inspection of the property.
